name: Dice Stacker
description:
Test your patience by building a dice tower! Or just mess around with the dice, you choose!

Controls

  • Move dice: Left click with mouse
  • Create dice: Space/Enter (or the top left on-screen button)
  • Scroll up: W/Up arrow key (or scroll up with the mouse wheel)
  • Scroll down: S/Down arrow key (or scroll down with the mouse wheel)
  • Hide UI: H
  • Mute background music: B
  • Mute sound effects: N
  • Mute all: M

Credits

Music by Matthew Pablo (http://www.matthewpablo.com):

  • Stepping Stones
  • A Conversation with Saul (Jazz/Blues Shuffle)
  • Beyond The Clouds (Orchestral Theme)

Dice impact sound by Kenney (www.kenney.nl):

  • UI Audio (click 3)
